response.overview: With only three weeks left in his three-year contract, Sam Bell is getting anxious to finally return to Earth. He is the only occupant of a Moon-based manufacturing facility along with his computer and assistant, GERTY. When he has an accident however, he awakens to find that he is not alone.
response.tagline: 250,000 miles from home, the hardest thing to face...is yourself.
response.title: Moon

titles.title: Moon - Die dunkle Seite des Mondes

release_dates.note: Film by the Sea Film Festival
